step-description.race: Dictates heritage, influencing abilities, traits, and cultural background.
step-description.class: Defines skills and abilities; determines combat and magical proficiency.
step-description.origin: Shapes backstory, impacting character values, experiences, and worldview.

quotes.example: Unravel the ancient prophecy to restore balance to the realm.

816120F8-924D-4ECF-9166-833F284CB762.name: Mage
816120F8-924D-4ECF-9166-833F284CB762.short-description: Reveal the Dungeon Master's cards, rearrange their order, jump around the board like a master of teleportation, and wield powerful spells.
816120F8-924D-4ECF-9166-833F284CB762.description: Human race thrives amidst a world of magic and mystery. Known for their remarkable diversity and boundless spirit, humans possess an unrivaled adaptability that allows them to flourish in even the harshest environments. From the snow-swept highlands of Northgarde to the sun-drenched cities of Solean, they build sprawling empires and forge destinies shaped by sword and sorcery. Governed by complex allegiances and driven by an insatiable quest for knowledge, humans walk paths fraught with danger and opportunity, ever eager to etch their tales into the annals of time. Join them, and forge your own legend.

CBB2268A-DF6A-40A6-A049-27445F28643E.name: Rogue
CBB2268A-DF6A-40A6-A049-27445F28643E.short-description: Hide in the shadows, adding hindering cards to the Dungeon Master's deck. Ambush your opponents, and lure enemies into the traps.
CBB2268A-DF6A-40A6-A049-27445F28643E.description: Human race thrives amidst a world of magic and mystery. Known for their remarkable diversity and boundless spirit, humans possess an unrivaled adaptability that allows them to flourish in even the harshest environments. From the snow-swept highlands of Northgarde to the sun-drenched cities of Solean, they build sprawling empires and forge destinies shaped by sword and sorcery. Governed by complex allegiances and driven by an insatiable quest for knowledge, humans walk paths fraught with danger and opportunity, ever eager to etch their tales into the annals of time. Join them, and forge your own legend.

5587BDFC-15CA-4BB1-B13F-B90B365CFD2A.name: Warrior
5587BDFC-15CA-4BB1-B13F-B90B365CFD2A.short-description: Destroy the Dungeon Master's cards, opponents on the board, and anything else that stands in your way to victory.
5587BDFC-15CA-4BB1-B13F-B90B365CFD2A.description: Human race thrives amidst a world of magic and mystery. Known for their remarkable diversity and boundless spirit, humans possess an unrivaled adaptability that allows them to flourish in even the harshest environments.
